patterns: Unyanyasaji wa nyumbani ni nini?
responses: Vurugu za nyumbani ni mtindo wa tabia unaotumiwa na mtu mmoja kupata mamlaka na udhibiti.

patterns: Je, ni aina gani tofauti za unyanyasaji wa nyumbani?
responses: Aina tofauti za unyanyasaji wa nyumbani ni pamoja na unyanyasaji wa kimwili, unyanyasaji wa kihisia, unyanyasaji wa kijinsia, unyanyasaji wa kifedha, na unyanyasaji wa kisaikolojia.

patterns: Je! ni ishara gani za onyo za unyanyasaji wa nyumbani?
Ni bendera gani nyekundu ninapaswa kutafuta?
responses: Dalili za onyo za unyanyasaji wa nyumbani ni pamoja na wivu, kumiliki, kudhibiti tabia, kujitenga, matusi, na unyanyasaji wa kimwili.

patterns: Nifanye nini ikiwa ninashuku kuwa mtu fulani ni mwathirika wa unyanyasaji wa nyumbani?
responses: Ikiwa unashuku kuwa mtu fulani ni mhasiriwa wa unyanyasaji wa nyumbani, unapaswa kutoa usaidizi na nyenzo, usikilize bila hukumu, na uwahimize kutafuta msaada.

patterns: Nifanye nini ikiwa mimi ni mwathirika wa unyanyasaji wa nyumbani?
responses: Ikiwa wewe ni mhasiriwa wa unyanyasaji wa nyumbani, unapaswa kutafuta usaidizi kutoka kwa simu ya dharura ya unyanyasaji wa nyumbani, makao, au mshauri. Unapaswa pia kuunda mpango wa usalama na kuzingatia kupata amri ya kuzuia.

patterns: Mpango wa usalama ni nini?
responses: Mpango wa usalama ni mpango uliobinafsishwa unaowasaidia waathiriwa wa unyanyasaji wa nyumbani kuwa salama na kujilinda wao na watoto wao dhidi ya unyanyasaji zaidi

patterns: Ninaweza kumsaidiaje rafiki ambaye ameathiriwa na jeuri ya nyumbani?
responses: Unaweza kumsaidia rafiki ambaye ni mhasiriwa wa unyanyasaji wa nyumbani kwa kutoa usaidizi na nyenzo, kusikiliza bila hukumu, na kuwatia moyo kutafuta msaada.

patterns: Ni nini athari za muda mrefu za unyanyasaji wa nyumbani?
responses: Madhara ya muda mrefu ya unyanyasaji wa nyumbani yanaweza kujumuisha majeraha ya kimwili, masuala ya afya ya akili, matumizi mabaya ya dawa za kulevya, na matatizo ya kifedha.

patterns: Ni nini matokeo ya kisheria ya unyanyasaji wa nyumbani?
responses: Madhara ya kisheria ya unyanyasaji wa nyumbani yanaweza kujumuisha kukamatwa, kufungwa jela, faini na rekodi ya uhalifu.

patterns: Tunaweza kuzuiaje unyanyasaji wa nyumbani?
responses: Tunaweza kuzuia unyanyasaji wa nyumbani kwa kukuza mahusiano mazuri, kuwaelimisha watu kuhusu ishara za onyo za unyanyasaji, na kuwawajibisha wanyanyasaji kwa matendo yao.

patterns: Gịnị bụ ime ihe ike n'ezinụlọ?
responses: Ime ihe ike n'ụlọ bụ usoro omume nke otu onye mmadụ ji eme ihe iji nweta ike na ịchịkwa onye ọzọ na mmekọrịta chiri anya.

patterns: Kedu ụdị ihe ike dị iche iche n'ụlọ?
responses: Dị iche iche nke ime ihe ike n'ụlọ na-agụnye mmegbu, mmetọ mmetụta uche, mmetọ mmekọahụ, mmetọ uche, na nke metụtara mmụọ.

patterns: Gịnị bụ ihe ịrịba ama ịdọ aka ná ntị nke ime ihe ike n'ụlọ?
responses: Agedọ aka na ntị banyere ime ihe ike n'ụlọ gụnyere ekworo, nwekwaa akparamagwa, ịnọpụ iche, mkparị, na ime ihe ike.

patterns: Kedu ihe m ga - eme ma ọ bụrụ na m na - eche na m na - eme ihe ike n'ezinụlọ?
responses: Ọ bụrụ na ị na-eche na onye na-eme ihe ike n'ụlọ, ị ga-enye ndị na-akwado ya na akụ, gee ntị n'enweghị ikpe, ma gbaa ha ume ịchọ enyemaka.

patterns: Gịnị ka m ga-eme ma ọ bụrụ na m bụ onye na-eme ihe ike n'ezinụlọ?
responses: Ọ bụrụ na egburu gị nke ime ihe ike n'ụlọ, ịkwesịrị ịchọ enyemaka site na ime ihe ike ụlọ, ebe obibi, ma ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ.Ikwesiri imepụta atụmatụ nchekwa ma na-atụle inweta usoro igbochi.

patterns: Gịnị bụ atụmatụ nchekwa?
responses: Atụmatụ nchekwa bụ atụmatụ ahaziri ahazi nke na-enyere ndị aka ime ihe ike n'ezi ihe ike na nchekwa onwe ha na ụmụ ha aka imetọ ndị ọzọ.

patterns: Olee otú m ga-esi nyere enyi ya bụ onye na-eme ihe ike jikọrọ aka aka?
responses: I nwere ike inyere enyi ya bụ onye e ji eme ihe ike n'ime ụlọ site n'ịzụnye nkwado na akụ, na-ege ha ntị n'enweghị ikpe, ma gbaa ha ume ka ha chọọ enyemaka.

patterns: Kedu ihe bụ oge ime ihe ike n'ụlọ?
responses: Onwe-ogologo oge nke ime ihe ike n'ụlọ nwere ike ịgụnye mmerụ ahụ nkịtị, nsogbu ahụike uche, iji ike ọgwụgwụ, na nsogbu ego.

patterns: Gịnị bụ nsonaazụ nke ime ihe ike n'ụlọ?
responses: Mmezi ihe omume dị n'ụlọ nwere ike ịgụnye njide, ụlọ mkpọrọ, ego, na ndekọ na onye omekome.

patterns: Kedụ ka anyị ga - esi gbochie ime ihe ike n'ezinụlọ?
responses: Anyị nwere ike igbochi ime ihe ike n'ụlọ site na ịkwalite mmekọrịta dị mma, ịkụziri ndị mmadụ banyere ihe mgbaàmà ịdọ aka ná ntị, na ijide ndị na-eme ihe ga-aza ajụjụ maka omume ha.

patterns: Menene tashin hankali na cikin gida?
responses: Rikicin cikin gida wani tsari ne na halayyar mutum da mutum yayi amfani da shi don samun iko da iko akan wani mutum a cikin kusancin dangantaka.

patterns: Menene nau'ikan tashin hankali na cikin gida?
responses: Daban-daban nau'ikan tashin hankali na cikin gida sun hada da cin zarafin jiki, cin zarafin tunani, cin zarafin jima'i, cin zarafin kuɗi, da cin zarafin tunani.

patterns: Menene alamun gargaɗin tashin hankali na cikin gida?
responses: Alamar gargadi game da tashin hankali na cikin gida sun hada da kishi, mallaka, sarrafa hali, warewa, cin zarafin baki, da tashin hankali na jiki.

patterns: Me zan yi idan na yi zargin wani wanda aka azabtar da rikicin cikin gida?
responses: Alamar gargadi game da tashin hankali na cikin gida sun hada da kishi, mallaka, sarrafa hali, warewa, cin zarafin baki, da tashin hankali na jiki.

patterns: Me zan yi idan na kasance wanda aka azabtar da tashin hankali a cikin gida?
responses: Idan kai wanda aka azabtar da tashin hankali a cikin gida, ya kamata ka nemi taimako daga layin tashin hankali na cikin gida, tsari, ko mai ba da shawara. Hakanan ya kamata ku ƙirƙiri shirin aminci kuma kuyi la'akari da samun umarnin hanawa.

patterns: Menene shirin aminci?
responses: Tsarin aminci tsari ne na mutum wanda ke taimaka wa wadanda rikicin ya ritsa da su cikin gida su kasance cikin aminci kuma su kare kansu da yaransu daga ci gaba da cin zarafi.

patterns: Ta yaya zan iya taimaka wa aboki wanda ke fama da tashin hankali a cikin gida?
responses: Kuna iya taimaka wa aboki wanda aka azabtar da tashin hankali na cikin gida ta hanyar bayar da tallafi da albarkatu, saurare ba tare da yanke hukunci ba, da ƙarfafa su don neman taimako.

patterns: Menene tasirin tashin hankali na cikin gida?
responses: Sakamakon tashe-tashen hankula na cikin gida na iya haɗawa da raunin jiki, abubuwan da suka shafi lafiyar kwakwalwa, cin zarafin abubuwa, da matsalolin kuɗi.

patterns: Menene sakamakon shari'a na tashin hankali na cikin gida?
responses: Sakamakon shari'a na tashin hankali na cikin gida na iya haɗawa da kamawa, lokacin kurkuku, tara kuɗi, da rikodin laifi.

patterns: Ta yaya zamu iya hana tashin hankali a cikin gida?
responses: Zamu iya hana tashin hankali a cikin gida ta hanyar inganta ingantacciyar dangantaka, ilmantar da mutane game da alamun gargadi na cin zarafi, da kuma sanya masu cin zarafin yin hisabi game da ayyukansu.

patterns: Menene sake zagayowar tashin hankali na gida?
responses: Tsarin tashin hankali na cikin gida wani tsari ne na halayyar da ya hada da ginin tashin hankali, wani lamari mai cin mutunci, sulhu, da kuma lokacin kwanciyar hankali.

patterns: Menene tasirin tashin hankali na cikin gida akan wanda aka azabtar?
responses: Tasirin tashin hankali na cikin gida akan wanda aka azabtar na iya haɗawa da raunin jiki, abubuwan da suka shafi lafiyar kwakwalwa, da matsalolin kuɗi.

patterns: Menene layin tashin hankali na cikin gida?
responses: Layin tashin hankali na cikin gida shine lambar waya wanda waɗanda ke fama da tashin hankali na cikin gida na iya kira don samun taimako da tallafi..

patterns: Menene Hoton Rikicin Cikin Gida na Kasa?
responses: Hotline na Rikicin Cikin Gida shine layin 24/7 wanda ke ba da tallafi da albarkatu ga waɗanda rikicin ya ritsa da su.

patterns: Menene Rikicin Dokar Mata?
responses: Rikici da Dokar Mata wata doka ce ta tarayya wacce ke ba da kudade don shirye-shiryen da ke tallafawa wadanda rikicin ya ritsa da su.

patterns: Menene aikin kotu a shari'ar tashin hankali na cikin gida?
responses: Matsayin kotu a shari'ar tashin hankali na cikin gida shine fitar da umarni na hanawa, gurfanar da masu cin zarafin, da kare wanda aka azabtar.

patterns: Menene rawar da al'umma ke takawa a cikin tashin hankali na cikin gida?
responses: Matsayi na al'umma a cikin rikice-rikicen cikin gida shine tallafawa wadanda rikicin ya ritsa da su da kuma inganta kokarin rigakafin.

patterns: What is domestic violence?
responses: Domestic violence is a pattern of behavior used by one person to gain power and control.

patterns: What are the different types of domestic violence?
responses: The different types of domestic violence include physical abuse, emotional abuse, sexual abuse, financial abuse, and psychological abuse.

patterns: What are the warning signs of domestic violence?
What red flags should I look for?
responses: The warning signs of domestic violence include jealousy, possessiveness, controlling behavior, isolation, verbal abuse, and physical violence.

patterns: What should I do if I suspect someone is a victim of domestic violence?
responses: If you suspect someone is a victim of domestic violence, you should offer support and resources, listen without judgment, and encourage them to seek help.

patterns: What should I do if I am a victim of domestic violence?
responses: If you are a victim of domestic violence, you should seek help from a domestic violence hotline, a shelter, or a counselor. You should also create a safety plan and consider getting a restraining order.

patterns: What is a safety plan?
responses: A safety plan is a personalized plan that helps victims of domestic violence stay safe and protect themselves and their children from further abuse

patterns: How can I help a friend who is a victim of domestic violence?
responses: You can help a friend who is a victim of domestic violence by offering support and resources, listening without judgment, and encouraging them to seek help.

patterns: What are the long-term effects of domestic violence?
responses: The long-term effects of domestic violence can include physical injuries, mental health issues, substance abuse, and financial problems.

patterns: What are the legal consequences of domestic violence?
responses: The legal consequences of domestic violence can include arrest, jail time, fines, and a criminal record.

patterns: How can we prevent domestic violence?
responses: We can prevent domestic violence by promoting healthy relationships, educating people about the warning signs of abuse, and holding abusers accountable for their actions.

patterns: What is the cycle of domestic violence ?
responses: The cycle of domestic violence is a pattern of behavior that includes tension building, an abusive incident, reconciliation, and a calm period.

patterns: What is gaslighting?
responses: Gaslighting is a form of emotional abuse in which the abuser manipulates the victim into doubting their own memory, perception, or sanity.

patterns: What is financial abuse?
responses: Emotional abuse is a form of domestic violence in which the abuser uses words, actions, or behaviors to control, intimidate, or manipulate the victim.

patterns: What is financial abuse?
responses: Financial abuse is a form of domestic violence in which the abuser controls the victim's finances and restricts their access to money.

patterns: What is physical abuse?
responses: Physical abuse is a form of domestic violence in which the abuser uses physical force to control, intimidate, or harm the victim.

patterns: What is Sexual abuse?
responses: Sexual abuse is a form of domestic violence in which the abuser uses sex or sexual acts to control, intimidate, or harm the victim.

patterns: What is Psychologies abuse?
responses: Psychological abuse is a form of domestic violence in which the abuser uses words, actions, or behaviors to control, intimidate, or manipulate the victim.

patterns: What is stalking?
responses: Stalking is a form of domestic violence in which the abuser follows, harasses, or threatens the victim.

patterns: What is a restraining order?
responses: A restraining order is a legal order that prohibits an abuser from contacting or coming near the victim.

patterns: What is financial abuse?
responses: A domestic violence shelter is a safe place where victims of domestic violence can go to escape abuse and get support.

patterns: What is a domestic violence hotline?
I want to report abuse
help
please help
responses: A domestic violence hotline is a phone number that victims of domestic violence can call to get help and support. You can call to 987 to report.

patterns: What is the National Domestic Violence Hotline?
responses: The National Domestic Violence Hotline is a 24/7 hotline that provides support and resources to victims of domestic violence.

patterns: What is the Violence Against Women Act?
responses: The Violence Against Women Act is a federal law that provides funding for programs that support victims of domestic violence.

patterns: What is the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act?
responses: The Family Violence Prevention and Services Act is a federal law that provides funding for programs that support victims of domestic violence.

patterns: What is the impact of domestic violence on children?
responses: The impact of domestic violence on children can include physical injuries, mental health issues, and behavioral problems.
